title: Virtual Legal Assistant - Personal Injury Law Firm (Australia)
job_overview:
About Us:
We are a dedicated personal injury law firm committed to fighting for the rights of accident victims. Our team is passionate about providing compassionate and effective legal representation to help clients receive the compensation they deserve.

Job Description:
We are seeking a detail-oriented Legal Assistant to support our lawyers in handling personal injury cases. Responsibilities include drafting documents, managing case files, communicating with clients, and coordinating with medical providers and insurance companies. The ideal candidate is highly organised, proactive and able to effectively prioritise tasks and work.

Requirements:
1. Bachelors Degree 
2. 2+ year’s experience as a legal assistant (verified with previous employer); experience in personal injury is highly preferred
3. STRICTLY no concurrent online job/work 
4. Fast and reliable internet connection (100mbps+) 
5. Modern PC specs, Intel i5 or AMD Ryzen 5 (or higher), 16GB RAM
6. High level of proficiency with computers
7. Time tracking will be utilised 

Benefits:
1. Desirable east coast Australian time zone (AEST/AEDT)
2. Highly competitive salary (PHP 30,000 to 60,000 monthly, based on experience and performance)
3. Opportunities for growth as team expands
4. Generous leave entitlements (31 days total, incl public holidays)

PS please include two special characters in your application in a row. such as '##'
